name: Big Large Succ
description:
In Big Large Succ, your goal is to get the highest score possible by hopping from asteroid to asteroid in order to avoid the Spacehole that's succing the whole asteroid belt in. Different colored asteroids will impact your score multiplier differently, and being in close range to the Spacehole will double your multiplier. Is the risk worth it? Get the highest score possible!

Credits:

Vladimir - UI Programmer

Mike - Gameplay Programmer

Comment your high score below!
